DDL.statement: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW view_barcode_validate AS (SELECT APP_PROCESS_ORDER.PROCESS_ORDER, APP_PROCESS_ORDER.MATERIAL, APP_PROCESS_ORDER.STATUS, APP_PROCESS_ORDER.REQUIRED_RESOURCE, APP_MATERIAL.DESCRIPTION, APP_PROCESS_ORDER.REQUIRED_UOM AS PROD_UOM, UOM_PROD.EAN AS PROD_EAN, UOM_PROD.VARIANT AS PROD_VARIANT, APP_MATERIAL.BASE_UOM, UOM_BASE.EAN AS BASE_EAN, UOM_BASE.VARIANT AS BASE_VARIANT FROM APP_PROCESS_ORDER, APP_MATERIAL, APP_MATERIAL_UOM UOM_PROD, APP_MATERIAL_UOM UOM_BASE WHERE APP_MATERIAL.MATERIAL = APP_PROCESS_ORDER.MATERIAL AND UOM_PROD.MATERIAL = APP_PROCESS_ORDER.MATERIAL AND UOM_PROD.UOM = APP_PROCESS_ORDER.REQUIRED_UOM AND UOM_BASE.MATERIAL = APP_MATERIAL.MATERIAL AND UOM_BASE.UOM = APP_MATERIAL.BASE_UOM)
